exclusion.criterion: Preterm delivery before 37 weeks of pregnancy

exclusion.criterion: Patient at increased risk for aspiration based on anesthesiologist assesment

exclusion.criterion: A patient post epidural anesthesia with pain indicating the need for a new epidural insertion

notes: 54-year-old obese woman admitted to emergency department with abdominal pain, nausea and vomiting. Ultrasound revealed several gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones.
